Title: Zombie Hotel
Actors: Aileen Mythen, Luca Massimo, Hillary Kavanagh
Plot: Pass the Fawlty Towers, turn right after the Adams Family's and you'll find the ZOMBIE HOTEL! Wide eyed twins Fungus and Maggot will welcome you, along with their Mum and Dad Zombies, Rictus and Funerella, and a team of wacky empl...
